product_name: Mountain Hardwear Hoener Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for travel, the women's Mountain Hardwear Hoener Jacket is a lightweight, urban wind shell that packs down small and resists wrinkles amazingly well. Durable, tightly woven polyester sluffs off wind and moisture and resists wrinkling even when balled up. Internal windflap prevents wind from penetrating front zipper; flip up the collar to protect your neck when it gets chilly. Internal waist adjustment personalizes the fit. Adjustable button cuff tabs. Covered mesh rear vents maximize breathability. Mountain Hardwear Hoener Jacket for women has hand pockets and a droptail hem with kick pleat. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for travel, the women's Mountain Hardwear Hoener Jacket is a lightweight, urban wind shell that packs down small and resists wrinkles amazingly well.
